name: walkable-buffer
description: ğŸš¶ğŸ›¡ï¸ A class for easily reading data from binary Buffers
author: Oscar Busk <oscar.busk@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rimraf dist/ dist.module/ && tsc && tsc -P tsconfig.module.json
scripts.docs: typedoc --out api --mode file --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --tsconfig src/tsconfig.app.json --theme markdown --readme none
scripts.posttest: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run docs && git add api && git add api -u
